# Welcome

This document is a tutorial for self-learning the basic use of `R`. It was prepared for the students enrolled in the first year of the [AIRE Life Sciences Master Program](https://www.cri-paris.org/en/education#04._aire-master) of the Centre de Recherche Interdisciplinaire at the Université de Paris.
